translation.text: Blue Mountains Line, Central Coast & Newcastle Line, North Shore Line, Northern Line, Western Line - Delays

Delays continue to some services due to a train requiring mechanical repairs between Town Hall and Wynyard earlier. Increased journey times and larger than normal service gaps may be experienced. You may also need to change trains to continue your journey. 

Please allow extra travel time, listen to announcements, check Station information screens and transport apps for service updates as trains may depart from different platforms.

Buses are replacing trains between Campbelltown and Moss Vale in both directions due to fallen power lines across the tracks at Picton. 

At this stage we do not have a forecast as to when trains can resume. Further information will be provided as it becomes available.

The 4:00pm Central to Moss Vale service will operate as scheduled. Moss Vale to Goulburn services will operate as timetabled in both directions.

Delays may be experienced. Consider making your own alternative arrangements, delay travelling or allow plenty of additional travel time.

NRL: Rabbitohs v Storm - Stadium Australia, Sydney Olympic Park
19:50 to 21:40
- The closest station to Stadium Australia is Olympic Park.
- Trains run from Lidcombe to Olympic Park every 10 minutes until late.

Jersey Boys - WIN Entertainment Centre, Wollongong
19:30 to 22:00
- The closest station to the event is Wollongong on the South Coast Line. The venue is approximately 15 minutes walk from the station via Burelli Street. 

For details, please visit https://transportnsw.info/events/2021/05

The escalator between suburban concourse and intercity platforms is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 1777.
An escalator between platforms 1 & 2 and the concourse is temporarily out of service. Please use the nearby escalator. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9379 4843.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9847 8458.
The lift between the footbridge and Beecroft Road is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 8878 4100.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and Kiora road is temporarily out of service.  If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9522 1295.
The lift beween the Concourse and Swan street via Kingsway is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9522 1265.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4223 5616.
The lift between the concourse and Farrow Road is out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 4629 0721.
The lift between the concourse and platform is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask station staff or call 9851 7244.
Station Update - Canterbury, Dulwich Hill, Hurlstone Park and more
Due to Metro construction works, platforms have a reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of the construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platforms.
Station Update - Bexley North, Birrong, Redfern
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

Ongoing until 30 June some stairs between the station and the street level will close for upgrade works. During this time follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest available stairs. If you need further assistance, see station staff or call 93794110.

The stairs from Richardsons Crescent to concourse will be closed for maintenance work until November 2021. Access to platforms 2 and 3 will now be via platform 1 side entrance (off carpark on Richardsons Crescent). Entrance from Griffiths St will not be affected.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
